long_desc.thetext:
In order to improve the startup performance of our application, we would like to preload several parts parallel in the application startup script. To do this, the generator config should be extended with an array of the parts that should be preloaded.
The boot part should be executed directly when loaded (i.e. the application should start). The other parts, depending on the loading state, should be added to the PartLoader "loaded" / "isLoading" list, so that the application can assume loading the scripts by the PartLoader class.
In addition to this feature, it should be possible to split up certain parts into small packages (and override the global "min-package" property for a part). This should be done, as we would like to preload the packages on the portal page, while the user is viewing the portal page.
-> Fabian ist currently working on this enhancement
Will be implemented in a different way by the qooxdoo team
